description: {"blocks":[{"key":"mtg2","text":"This protocol described the generation of fluid-walled dumbbells for culturing of induced pluripotent stem cell-derived neurons with directional connectivity so as to recapitulate the human corticostriatal connectivity. The fluid-walled microfluidic technology was first reported by Walsh et al., 2017 and subsequently shown to be adaptable for cell culture.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":289,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":283,"length":18},{"key":1,"offset":331,"length":26}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"4BA4BF50E2A611EDB0D95B2970EA2767","url":"https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29018186/"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5C972050E2A611EDB0D95B2970EA2767","url":"https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29895687/"}}}}

supplement (ThermoFisher Scientific, CAT# 51142-49-5)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":0,"length":22}],"data":{}},{"key":"8smdf","text":"Geltrex™ LDEV-Free Reduced Growth Factor Basement Membrane Matrix","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":6,"offset":0,"length":65}],"data":{}},{"key":"3tgtu","text":"Neurobasal (CAT# Scientific, CAT# 11140050)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":7,"offset":0,"length":44}],"data":{}},{"key":"fiem3","text":"Penicillin-Streptomycin (10,000 U/mL) (ThermoFisher Scientific, CAT# CAT# A3890401)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":9,"offset":0,"length":13}],"data":{}},{"key":"hat9","text":"ROCK inhibitor Y-27632 (ROCKi) (CAT# 1254)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":10,"offset":0,"length":22}],"data":{}},{"key":"173kv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9e3n","text":"Equipment:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1ulg","text":"In-house Fluid Printer (Iota Science Ltd.)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bcft6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7p4b8","text":"Preparing cMM solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c66m2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8a78f","text":"Preparing striatal Neuronal Induction base medium (sNIM):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":57}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"19v4d","text":"DMEM/F12 basal medium","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95s9","text":"1% MEM Non-Essential Amino Acids (NEAA)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4lncq","text":"1% Glutamax","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9cspf","text":"1x B27 without vitamin A","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgf9e","text":"1% penicillin/Streptomycin (P/S)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95g07","text":"0.05% β-mercaptoethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"10D57088E2AA11EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.stemcell.com/products/accutase.html"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"FD492C11E2A711EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/A1413202"}},"10":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E7EDE36AE2A911EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.bio-techne.com/p/small-molecules-peptides/y-27632-dihydrochloride_1254"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"12845876E2AC11EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/21985023"}},"3":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D59DD04CE2AB11EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/11320033"}},"4":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D59DD09FE2AB11EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/10565018?SID=srch-srp-10565018"}},"5":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"72FD7030E2EA11ED986445EF4545DCF4","url":"https://www.3m.com/3M/en_US/p/d/b40045180/"}},"6":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A41AFC90E2A711EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/A1413202"}},"7":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E7E9B52AE2AB11EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/11140050"}},"8":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"03B3B76FE2AC11EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/15140122"}},"9":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"ABE61210E2A711EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/A3890401"}}}}

parent_collections.title: Do, Q. B. & Nebuloni, F. et al. (2023) A fluid walled microfluidic platform for human neuronal microcircuits and axotomy.
Do, Q. B. & Nebuloni, F. et al. (2023) A fluid walled microfluidic platform for human neuronal microcircuits and axotomy.

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"18g23","text":"Preparation of petri dishes (Day -7)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":36}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4vv1o","text":"Pre-coat 6 cm petri dishes with 7 mL of Poly-D-lysine overnight. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"adthi","text":"Remove Poly-D-lysine and wash with PBS twice.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2thfa","text":"Remove PBS and add a thin layer of neurobasal supplemented with B27.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eio7r","text":"Leave to incubate for at least 15 mins.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e4j9p","text":"Remove neurobasal and add a thin layer of fresh FC40.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"l4ea","text":"Jet an array of 3*7 dumbbells (3*3 cm) using an in-house fluid printer. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8i2l4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d477o","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":4,"offset":65}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"rc3o","text":"G-Code to jet-print the microfluid-walled dumbbells can be found here.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"AF7CFC31EFE011EDB6E1B75CC9C462A0","url":"https://github.com/craggASAP/microfluid_axotomy.git"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1q6pp","text":"Coat each dumbbell with 2 µl of 0.46 mg/ml of Geltrex overnight. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2nc6a","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"85qtb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":18,"offset":152,"style":"bold"}],"key":"362g0","text":"Coat dumbbells as soon as possible to avoid evaporation of FC40 which might cause collapse/merging of fluid walls. If working with many dishes, perform steps 1.6 and 1.7. in smaller batches. ","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"370t5","text":"Day -05: Plating Cortical Neurons (CNs)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":39}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"k0ih","text":"Preparing media \u0026 spinning tubes for CNs plating","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":48},{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":48}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c1kf8","text":"2.1.1. On the day of, before starting, add Rock inhibitor (ROCKi) (1:1000) to cMM and pre-warm this media in the water bath.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9kja7","text":"2.1.2. Add 9 mL of Neurobasal to a 15 mL falcon (spinning tube) for each vial to be thawed and prewarm.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fb2m","text":"Day -03: Transduction of CNs with LV-Ngn2-GFP","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":45}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fod8b","text":"Replating of adherent D32 post-puromycin selection CNs","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":54},{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":54}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cufs","text":"2.2.1. Aspirate media from CNs wells and rinse with 1 mL PBS.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2u7i1","text":"2.2.2. Aspirate PBS and add 1 mL of room temperature Accutase per well of 6-well plate.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blvrp","text":"2.2.3. Incubate at 37ºC for ~5 minutes, until cells detach.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4aj6t","text":"2.2.4. Collect all of the well contents and add to the pre-warmed spinning falcon.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ak99c","text":"2.2.5. Spin at 350g for 5 minutes.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a41gu","text":"2.2.6. Resuspend cells in the pre-warmed cMM supplemented with ROCKi (1:1000) and count the cell number using either the cell counter or a haemocytometer.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40jp1","text":"2.2.7. Calculate the appropriate dilution such that CNs are to be deposited into the cortical chambers of all dumbbells at the replating density of 13,000 cells/dumbbell in 1 µl of cell suspension. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1at7r","text":"2.2.8. Add 3 µl of cMM into the striatal chamber.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"edpt3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cvv77","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":11,"offset":25,"style":"bold"}],"key":"32m7h","text":"The volume difference on step 2.2.8. creates a positive fluid pressure gradient toward the cortical chamber, restricting movement of CN cell bodies away from the chamber.","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e0er7","text":"Transduce CNs in the cortical chamber with LV-Ngn2-GFP, 50 µl of viral stock/2 µl.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ev79a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"burse","text":"Add 2 µl of fresh cortical media (without lentiviruses) into the striatal chamber.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"372ij","text":"Day 0: Plating of Day 16 MSN progenitors","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":40}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ln54","text":"Prepare sMM supplemented with ROCKi (1:1000) and pre-warm this media in the water bath.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a763f","text":"Add 9 mL of Neurobasal to a 15 mL falcon (spinning tube) for each vial to be thawed and prewarm.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dgckc","text":"Remove media from both chambers.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"56um4","text":"Thaw cryovial containing MSN progenitors in water bath until only a small component remains frozen.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"oqok","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3dn7v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3aiid","text":"Swirl the vial to thaw the MSN progenitors and check frequently to ensure the vial do not get completely thawed while in the water bath. ","type":"align-justify"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7pi2n","text":"","type":"align-justify"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5kqvl","text":"Be very careful to wipe down the vial with ethanol after removing from the water bath, and try to not place lid underwater to remove the risk of contamination.","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3sb2o","text":"Carefully transfer contents of cryovial to pre-warmed spinning tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"162hq","text":"Centrifuge at 350g for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"58v2a","text":"Aspirate media from cell pellet in spinning falcon and replace with 1 mL sMM1 + Rocki, slowly and gently resuspending the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"881p2","text":"Count the cell number using either the cell counter or a haemocytometer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a2361","text":"Calculate the appropriate dilution such that MSN progenitors are to be deposited into the striatal chamber of all dumbbells at the replating density of 13,000 cells/dumbbell in 1 µl of cell suspension.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dd7dr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5joso","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8t1so","text":"For different culturing condition, medium from the striatal chamber is removed and replaced with either 1 µl of either MSN cell suspension (13,000 cells/dumbbell) or standard cortical media (i.e. cMM) or cortical media supplemented with 10-fold BDNF (i.e. cMM with 100 ng/ml BDNF).","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6ul0e","text":"Add 3 µl of cMM into the cortical chamber.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ab8o9","text":"Day 2 – media change","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"as2g4","text":"Remove 2 µL (i.e. half) of media from each chamber.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6bbg7","text":"Add 2 µL (i.e. half) of fresh cMM and sMM to the cortical and striatal chamber, respectively.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fdcb9","text":"Day 4, 6 and 8 – media change","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"botf9","text":"Perform similar media change at these days.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Fabrication of fluid-walled dumbbells and generation of the human corticostriatal pathway
title_html: Fabrication of fluid-walled dumbbells and generation of the human corticostriatal pathway
